com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.panels

Class AdapterDetailsPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.panels.AdapterDetailsPanel

  • public class AdapterDetailsPanel
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates model for table with Adapter information.

        private void createDetailsTable()
        Creates new DefaultTableModel for JDetailsTable given as constructor parameter. Also assigns renderer JDetailsTableCellRenderer for table
